concept.description: Creates a relationship JACOCO_CLASS between CLASS labeled nodes and JACOCO_CLASS labeled nodes with same FQN.
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:CLASS), (s:JACOCO_CLASS) WHERE c.FQN=s.FQN CREATE UNIQUE (c)-[:JACOCO_CLASS]->(s) RETURN count(c)

concept.description: Creates a relationship HAS_JACOCO_METHOD between METHOD labeled nodes and JACOCO_METHOD labeled nodes of the same class with same signature.
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:CLASS)-[:DECLARES]->(m:METHOD), (jc:JACOCO_CLASS)-->(jm:JACOCO_METHOD) WHERE c.FQN=jc.FQN AND m.SIGNATURE=jm.SIGNATURE CREATE UNIQUE (m)-[:HAS_JACOCO_METHOD]->(jm) RETURN count(m)
